Chiseling: Not supported - Forced via IMC.
Chiseling: Not supported - Forced via tags
mod.chiselsandbits.result.missing_bits: Not enough bits or chisel durability!
mod.chiselsandbits.result.require_bag: You need empty slots in your inventory or a bag before you can use this item!
mod.chiselsandbits.result.void_excess: Your inventory has filled up, any excess bits have been voided!
mod.chiselsandbits.help.chiseled_block: {} to place;{} to ignore block grid;Mouse Wheel to cycle placement rotation.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bit: {} to chisel;{} to place;Use {} to display menu.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.positiveprint: {} to write;{} to chisel/place or Craft with bits/bags.;Mouse Wheel to cycle rotation;Use {} to display menu.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.negativeprint: {} to write;{} to chisel.;Mouse Wheel to cycle rotation.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.mirrorprint: {} the face you wish to mirror from;Craft with positive/negative design to transfer.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bitsaw: Craft with Blocks or Chiseled blocks;Cut along any of the 3 axis.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bittank.empty: Fill with fluid and extract bits.;Currently empty.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bittank.full: Fill with fluid and extract bits.; Contains: {}.; {} Bits remaining.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.tape_measure: {} and drag to measure;{} + {} to clear;Use {} to display menu.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.magnifying_glass: Hover over block to check if compatible.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.chiseled_block.l: Left-click to place the block. Sneak while placing to ignore block grid. Shift + Mouse Wheel to cycle placement rotation.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bit_bag.long: Automatically re-stocks, and store bits when you exceed or go under a stack in your inventory.\n\nCraft with any dye to color.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.wrench.long: Right-click blocks to rotate them around the axis of the face you click.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.tape_measure.lon: Left-click to and drag to measure spaces. Sneak Use to remove previously created measurements. Use the menu to switch between measurement modes.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.magnifying_glass: This item allows for the analysis of blocks in the world. It allows you by hovering over a block to see, why a block is supported by C&B or why not.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bit.long: Left-click to chisel the highlighted area. Right-click to place at the designated area.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.positiveprint.lo: Right-click on a chiseled block to write the design. Right-click on a block to chisel it adding and removing any bits that do not match the design. You can also place the design in a crafting table and Craft with bits/bags. Shift + Mouse Wheel can be used to cycle rotations without moving.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.negativeprint.lo: Right-click on a chiseled block to write the design. Right-click on a block to chisel it removing any bits that are not in the negative design. Shift + Mouse Wheel can be used to cycle rotations without moving.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.mirrorprint.long: Right-click on a chiseled block face on wish to mirror from, clicking an east facing face will mirror it along the east->west axis. Craft written design with a positive or negative design to transfer the mirror image to the type of design you want.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.chisel.long: Left-click any compatible block to chisel. Right-click to cycle through chisel modes, you can also use Shift + Mouse Wheel to cycle modes.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bitsaw.long: Craft this saw with supported blocks, or symmetrical chiseled blocks to cut them in half. The axis of cutting is determined by the position of the saw related the block, cut along the X axis with the saw to the side, along the Y axis if the saw is above or below, and Z is if the saw is diagonal.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.bittank.long: Right-click with a bucket to insert/remove fluid. Right-click without a bucket to extract bits from a filled tank, shift+right click inserts bits in your hand, inserting with an empty hand will attempt to insert as many bits as possible. You can use automation such as hoppers to extract bits from a tank with fluid in it.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.trash: Delete Bag Contents, Hold Item to filter.
mod.chiselsandbits.help.reallytrash: Click again to confirm deletion of all
mod.chiselsandbits.help.reallytrash_blan: Click again to confirm deletion of %s
commands.setbit.outOfWorld: Cannot place block outside of the world
commands.setbit.spaceOccupied: Bit cannot be placed space is occupied
mod.chiselsandbits.config.addBrokenBlock: Add Broken Blocks to Creative clipboard
mod.chiselsandbits.config.creativeClipbo: Number of items that can be stored on the creative clipboard before they begin to be removed, 0 will disable it.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.showUsage: Add help text to item descriptions
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableToolbarI: Show mode icon for chisel in tool bar
mod.chiselsandbits.config.itemNameModeDi: Notify mode changes with tool highlight
mod.chiselsandbits.config.dynamicModelFa: Models more complicated than this will use dynamic rendering.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.dynamicModelRa: Dynamically rendered blocks outside of this range will not render.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.dynamicModelMi: Disabling can improve performance at the cost of responsiveness.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.dynamicMaxConc: When this number is exceeded updates will begin pausing to prevent memory saturation.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enablePositive: Crafting a positive design with bits/bags of bits will let you craft the block.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableStackabl: Craft Chiseled Blocks to Remove Rotation
You can use this feature to stack the same design by stripping the rotation.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableNegative: Craft a filled negative design with a blank negative design.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableChiselTo: Check tool types / levels for chisels
To harvest obsidian bits you require a dimaond chisel.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableToolHarv: Check tool level when breaking blocks
Breaking an primary obsidian chiseled block will require a diamond level tool.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableBitLight: When disabled light emiting bits will simply glow and the block will emit no light level.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.bitLightPercen: Percentage of block for max light level
mod.chiselsandbits.config.bagStackSize.t: Stack size of bits in the bag: Minimum of 64, maximum of 99,999
mod.chiselsandbits.config.useGetLightVal: Use Get Light Value to get light value of blocks.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableFaceLigh: Use Model Analysis to get Lightmap Data.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableRightCli: Cycle Chisel mode on right click
mod.chiselsandbits.config.defaultToDynam: By default C&B uses the static renderer, and changes to the Dynamic Renderer on update, This setting reverse that; After determining the detail of the model it will decide to revert to the static renderer, helpful for more complicated scenes that cause stalls when using the static renderer.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.forceDynamicRe: Debug Setting, that disable the static render entirely.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.useVBO.tooltip: By Default uses the same setting as MC, but can be overridden.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.radialMenuVolu: Setting to Zero will disable it.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.enableChiselCr: Enable Chiseling Blocks in Crafting Table
mod.chiselsandbits.config.dynamicRenderF: Prevents Subdividing of dynamically rendered chunks into single blocks. This increases performance for most common cases ( chunks with a handful of complicated blocks ), but decreases performance for the worst cases ( chunks full of super complicated designs ).
mod.chiselsandbits.config.requireBagSpac: Requires there to be an empty slot in a bag or in the player's inventory before allowing them to use the chisel.
mod.chiselsandbits.config.voidExcessBits: Voids any bits that couldn't be fit into a bag or your inventory. Improves server performance. The undo action could have issues as some bits are voided.
mod.chiselsandbits.advancements.root.des: Get yourself a chisel and start diving into the world of bits.
mod.chiselsandbits.advancements.find-chi: A magnifying glass helps while discovering the world.
mod.chiselsandbits.advancements.collect-: All these little things have to go somewhere. These bags are useful!
mod.chiselsandbits.advancements.make-tan: Get fluid bits by using a bit tank.
